sense.def:
The scenery
je vse, kar vidimo okoli sebe, zlasti na deželi.

seg.quote: As we neared the border the scenery became lush and spectacular.

sense.def:
The scenery
so pobarvane deske in blago na zadnji steni gledališkega odra; ponazarjajo prizorišče.

seg.quote: The production uses a minimum of scenery.
